summary: A letter from U.S. District Judge Richard M. Berman to the Warden of the Metropolitan Correctional Center regarding the death of Jeffrey Epstein. The judge acknowledges the tragedy and raises an open question about whether ongoing investigations will include the July 23, 2019 incident involving Epstein at the MCC, noting that the Bureau of Prisons' conclusions about that incident have never been definitively explained.

keyFacts: Judge Richard M. Berman characterizes Jeffrey Epstein's death as 'a tragedy to everyone involved in his case.'
An open question is whether investigations into Epstein's death will include the July 23, 2019 incident at the Metropolitan Correctional Center involving Epstein.
Judge Berman states that, to his knowledge, the Bureau of Prisons' conclusions about the July 23 incident have never been definitively explained.
The document is a formal judicial correspondence, indicating official concern and oversight regarding the circumstances surrounding Epstein's death.
